data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Base Dados Items NFe'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define view entity /EXEDMINB/I_NFeMonitorI_Base
  as select from    /EXEDMINB/I_NFEITEM      as _NFeItem
    left outer join /EXEDMINB/I_NFEITEMDIV   as _NFeItemDiv        on  _NFeItemDiv.Id     = _NFeItem.Id
                                                                   and _NFeItemDiv.ItemId = _NFeItem.ItemId
  
  association [0..1] to I_PurchaseOrderItemAPI01 as _PurchaseOrderItem on _PurchaseOrderItem.PurchaseOrder     = $projection.Pedido
                                                                      and _PurchaseOrderItem.PurchaseOrderItem = $projection.ItemPedido
{
  key _NFeItem.Id                                 as ChaveNFe,
  key _NFeItem.ItemId                             as ItemNFe,
  key case
        when _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv is not null
          then _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv
        else 0 end                                as ItemIdDiv,
      case
        when _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv is not null
          then _NFeItemDiv.Pedido
        else _NFeItem.xPed end                    as Pedido,
      case
        when _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv is not null
          then _NFeItemDiv.ItemPedido
          else _NFeItem.nItemPed end              as ItemPedido,
      _NFeItem.NCM,
      _NFeItem.CFOP,
      case
        when _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv is not null
          then _NFeItemDiv.qCom
        else _NFeItem.qCom end                    as Quantidade,
      _NFeItem.vUnCom                             as ValorUnitario,
      _NFeItem.uCom                               as UnidadeMedida,
      case
        when _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv is not null
          then _NFeItemDiv.Lote
        else '' end                               as Lote,

      case
        when _NFeItem._ICMS00.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS00.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS02.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS02.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS10.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS10.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS15.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS15.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS20.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS20.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS30.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS30.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS40.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS40.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS51.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS51.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS53.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS53.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS60.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS60.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS61.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS61.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS70.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS70.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMS90.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS90.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMSPart.CST is not null then _NFeItem._ICMSPart.CST
        when _NFeItem._ICMSST.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMSST.CST
        else ''
      end                                         as Origem,

      case
        when _NFeItem._ICMS00.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS00.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS10.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS10.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS20.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS20.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS51.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS51.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS70.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS70.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS90.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS90.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMSPart.CST is not null then _NFeItem._ICMSPart.pICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMSST.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMSST.pICMS
        else 0
      end                                         as AliquotaICMS,

      case
        when _NFeItemDiv.ItemIdDiv  is not null then _NFeItemDiv.ValorICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS00.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS00.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS10.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS10.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS20.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS20.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS51.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS51.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS70.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS70.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMS90.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMS90.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMSPart.CST is not null then _NFeItem._ICMSPart.vICMS
        when _NFeItem._ICMSST.CST   is not null then _NFeItem._ICMSST.vICMS
        else 0
      end                                         as ValorICMS,

      _NFeItem._IPI.pIPI                          as AliquotaIPI,
      _NFeItem._IPI.vIPI                          as ValorIPI,

      /* Associations */
      _PurchaseOrderItem
}

[

],

],

}
